analysis.summary: Vue 3 component that renders a tracking history of order statuses, displaying each status with an optional checkmark for those already in the history.
analysis.purpose: Provides a visual history of status changes for an order, showing which statuses have occurred and when (timestamp display is currently commented out).

components.name: StatusHistory
components.responsibility: Renders a list of possible statuses, marks those present in the history, and lays out basic styling and icons.

components.name: IconCheckmark
components.responsibility: Displays a checkmark icon next to statuses that are already in the order's history.

functions.name: isStatusInHistory
functions.description: Checks whether a given status value exists in the current status history.

parameters.name: statusValue
parameters.description: The status name to check for in the history.

analysis.usage: Imported into higher-level order or tracking detail views. Passed props: statusHistory (Array of {status, timestamp, user, _id}), statusCurrent (String), edit (Boolean), statuses (Array of all possible status strings). Renders a scrollable/status list block wherever the order's tracking history is needed.
notes: statusDetailedHistory is computed once during component setup and is not reactive to later changes in props.statusHistory or props.statuses. Consider wrapping it in a computed() if reactivity is needed.
Timestamp and 'Check User' link are commented out, indicating future or conditional functionality.
There is a leftover console.log() with no arguments.
A printReceipt function and socket import are commented out, suggesting planned support for printing receipts via TCP sockets.
Styling relies on utility classes (bg-light, radius-medium, flex, etc.) from the project's CSS framework.
